Package org.objectfabric

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AsyncCallback<T>
    Used when doing an operation in a synchronous way, like calling method on a remote object.
    AsyncCallbackWithExecutor<T>
    AsyncCallback that needs to be invoked on a specific executor.
    CounterListener
    Called when a counter is modified.
    Debug.Assertion  
    IndexListener
    Called when a field changes on a transactional object or array.
    KeyListener<K>
    Called when an key is added, updated, or removed from a Map or Set.
    PermissionCallback
    Allows a server session to notify OF of a permission decision.
    ResourceListener
    Called when a resource is changed.
    Serializer
    OF uses a custom binary format to describe changes on objects.
    Session
    Server-side request notifications and permission settings.
    URIHandler  
    URIHandlersSet
    Manages handlers and caches needed by workspaces and servers to resolve URIs.

  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Permission
    OF supports a very simple permission model where resources can either not be accessed, read (synchronizing changes downstream only), or read-write.
    Remote.Status
